document.title: Accessing the EiffelStudio Project Conversion Tool

toc.envision_title: Accessing the EiffelStudio Project Conversion Tool

document.paragraph:
The EiffelStudio Project Conversion Tool works with EiffelStudio project ace files (*.ace). EiffelEnvision provides two means to access the EiffelStudio Project Conversion Tool installed with EiffelEnvision for use with EiffelStudio projects. requirements
2 Requirements
For all of the EiffelStudio Project Conversion Tool requirements please refer to
using.xml Using the EiffelStudio Conversion Tool
getting_started
2 Getting Started
There are two means to access and begin to use the EiffelStudio Project Conversion Tool. (1) When installed, a shortcut to the tool is installed under the EiffelEnvision Start Menu, Programs item. Under the Tools sub item. (2) Alternatively you can access the tool by simply by using Microsoft's Windows Explorer. Simply locate an EiffelStudio project ace file and right-mouse click to display the ace file context menu and select Import into EiffelEnvision.
Using either of these options will display the EiffelStudio Project Conversion Tool. If you selected to start the tool from Microsoft's Windows Explorer the some of the tool settings will be automatically populated for your convience.
see_also
